string_data: consistency_issue The summary omits crucial context that explains the timing and motivation of the protest. The original article emphasizes that this soup attack occurred "hours after other activists were jailed" and provides detailed background about the previous sentencing of Phoebe Plummer and Anna Holland for a similar attack in October 2022. This context is essential to understanding why the incident is characterized as a potential "revenge" attack (as indicated in the title). By removing this background information, the summary significantly changes the portrayal of the protest from one that appears to be a reactive response to the jailing of fellow activists to an isolated incident, thus failing to maintain the original article's framing and context.
